actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Education, Arts, Humanities.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Education, Arts and Humanities

official_title: A bill to establish a Bootstrap School Program.

summary.text: Bootstrap Schools Act - Amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to establish a Bootstrap School Program for recognition and rewarding of public and private elementary and secondary schools that have made substantial progress in: (1) raising student educational achievement; (2) creating a safe and drug-free school environment; and (3) reducing the dropout rate. Authorizes appropriations for FY 1991 through 1993 for such program. Provides for the award of Presidential Certificates of Merit to Bootstrap Schools.

titles.title: A bill to establish a Bootstrap School Program.
